title: Effective domain
summary: In convex analysis, a branch of mathematics, the effective domain extends of the domain of a function defined for functions that take values in the extended real number line [ − ∞ , ∞ ] = R ∪ { ± ∞ } . {\displaystyle [-\infty ,\infty ]=\mathbb {R} \cup \{\pm \infty \}.}
